component._description: A consumer that streams following the HTTP Live Streaming protocol

property.name: description
property._description: A description of the stream.

property.name: mount-point
property._description: The mount point on which the playlist and the stream can be accessed.

property.name: bouncer
property._description: The name of a bouncer in the atmosphere to authenticate against.

property.name: issuer-class
property._description: The Python class of the Keycard issuer to use.

property.name: type
property._description: 'master' to listen on a port, or 'slave' to slave to a porter (default master).

property.name: port
property._description: The port to listen on (if type is 'master').

property.name: porter-socket-path
property._description: The path to the socket to communicate with the porter.

property.name: porter-username
property._description: The username to authenticate to the porter.

property.name: porter-password
property._description: The password to authenticate to the porter.

property.name: hostname
property._description: The server's host name to display.

property.name: domain
property._description: The domain of the server for authentication.

property.name: hls-url
property._description: The url that will be used to render the playlist entries. If not defined hostname, port will be used to generate the url.

property.name: client-limit
property._description: The maximum number of clients allowed.

property.name: bandwidth-limit
property._description: The maximum bandwidth usage allowed in bits per second.

property.name: redirect-on-overflow
property._description: A URL to redirect clients to if either of the limits have been reached.

property.name: duration
property._description: How long to keep clients connected (in seconds).

property.name: fragment-prefix
property._description: Fragments prefix name to use in the playlist (default:fragment)

property.name: main-playlist
property._description: Main playlist resource name relative to the mount point (default:main.m3u8)

property.name: stream-playlist
property._description: Stream playlist resource name relative to the mount point (default:stream.m3u8)

property.name: stream-bitrate
property._description: Stream bitrate shown in the playlist in bps (default:300000)

property.name: keyframes-per-fragment
property._description: Number of keyframes per fragment (default:10)

property.name: new-fragment-tolerance
property._description: Tolerance to automatically add new fragments to the playlist. A 0 value means that the playlist won't be uptdated.(default:0)

property.name: min-window
property._description: Minimun number of fragments to start streaming (default:2)

property.name: max-window
property._description: Maximum number of fragments to expose in the playlist (default:5)

property.name: max-extra-buffers
property._description: Maximum number of extra fragments kept in the ring (default:max-window+1)

property.name: secret-key
property._description: Secret key used for HMAC

property.name: session-timeout
property._description: Session timeout in seconds (default:30)
